statements: SELECT * FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse
SELECT drug_id, dosage, patient_id, response FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE response = 'positive'
SELECT patient_id, response, drug_id, dosage FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT response, drug_id, dosage, patient_id FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT * FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE drug_id = 2 ORDER BY dosage ASC
SELECT * FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE drug_id = 1 AND response = 'Positive';
SELECT drug_id, dosage FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE patient_id = 5 ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT response FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE drug_id = 3 AND dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE response LIKE '%Negative%';
SELECT drug_id, response FROM DrugDosagePatientResponse WHERE dosage < 50 ORDER BY drug_id ASC, response DESC;
SELECT * FROM DrugDosage;
SELECT drug_name, dosage_mg FROM DrugDosage WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientResponse ORDER BY response_score DESC;
SELECT patient_name, response_score FROM PatientResponse WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, dosage_mg FROM DrugDosage WHERE drug_id = 2 OR drug_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, dosage_mg FROM DrugDosage WHERE dosage_mg > 100 ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT * FROM DrugDosage JOIN PatientResponse ON DrugDosage.drug_id = PatientResponse.patient_id WHERE response_score > 0.5 ORDER BY response_score DESC
SELECT drug_name, dosage_mg FROM DrugDosage WHERE drug_name LIKE 'A%' OR drug_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY drug_name ASC, dosage_mg DESC
SELECT * FROM DrugDosage WHERE drug_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM PatientResponse WHERE response_score < 0.3) ORDER BY drug_id ASC
SELECT patient_name, response_score FROM PatientResponse WHERE response_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6 ORDER BY response_score DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, weight FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage, expiry_date FROM Drugs WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, response FROM Patients JOIN Responses ON Patients.patient_id = Responses.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, weight FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT response, Patients.patient_name, Drugs.drug_name FROM Responses JOIN Patients ON Responses.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN Drugs ON Responses.drug_id = Drugs.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE dosage > 100 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, response FROM Patients JOIN Responses ON Patients.patient_id = Responses.patient_id WHERE response LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM DosageResponse WHERE drug_id = 3 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, dosage_prescribed FROM Patient JOIN Prescription ON Patient.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id JOIN Drug ON Prescription.drug_id = Drug.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, dosage_given, patient_response FROM Patient INNER JOIN DosageResponse ON Patient.patient_id = DosageResponse.patient_id;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Drug.drug_name, DosageResponse.dosage_given, DosageResponse.patient_response FROM Patient JOIN DosageResponse ON Patient.patient_id = DosageResponse.patient_id JOIN Drug ON DosageResponse.drug_id = Drug.drug_id WHERE DosageResponse.dosage_given BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY DosageResponse.dosage_given DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drug
SELECT name, dosage FROM Drug
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE id = 1
SELECT dosage, name FROM Drug WHERE dosage > 10
SELECT id, name, dosage FROM Drug ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT id, name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT id, name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE dosage < 20 OR dosage > 80;
SELECT id, name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE name LIKE '%n%' ORDER BY name ASC, dosage DESC;
